getAddressListFromHeader() getAddressListFromHeaderMessage MessagegetAddressListFromHeader
getAddressListFromHeader ( $headerName, $headerClass)[protected]
Retrieve the AddressList from a named header
Used with To, From, Cc, Bcc, and ReplyTo headers. If the header does not exist, instantiates it.
Paramètres
string$headerName
string$headerClass
Exceptions
Exception
DomainException Renvoie
AddressList
